attributes.action: Legalize the means to carry/use pepper spray for vulnerable people.
attributes.additional_details: To actually have a physical use of force to protect yourself from a violent situation, in the UK we are only permitted to use a 'criminal identifier' spray which only marks a target on a person without a means to stop them.
attributes.background:
The decriminalisation of carrying pepper spray as a means of safety and defence to suppress a violent situation.

As it currently stands, if found with pepper spray on a person could have you arrested and a criminal record.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577568
